tool_description: Aspose.Slides Cloud is a REST based API which allows you to read, edit and convert PowerPoint documents in the cloud. You can convert PowerPoint documents into various other formats like TIFF, PDF, PPTX, XPS and PPT etc. You can extract the contents like text and images from the PowerPoint documents.
name: Aspose.Slides Cloud
title: Aspose.Slides Cloud

api_list.name: PostSlidesAdd

optional_parameters.name: position
optional_parameters.description: The target position at which to create the slide. Add to the end by default.

optional_parameters.name: layoutAlias
optional_parameters.description: Alias of layout slide for new slide. Alias may be the type of layout, name of layout slide or index

PostSlidesSplit

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Export format. Default value is jpeg.

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: The start slide number for splitting, if is not specified splitting starts from the first slide of the presentation.

optional_parameters.name: destFolder
optional_parameters.description: Folder on storage where images are going to be uploaded. If not specified then images are uploaded to same folder as presentation.

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: The last slide number for splitting, if is not specified splitting ends at the last slide of the document.

optional_parameters.description: Storage folder containing custom fonts to be used with the document.

api_list.name: PostSlidesCopy

required_parameters.name: slideToCopy
required_parameters.description: The index of the slide to be copied from the source presentation.

optional_parameters.name: position
optional_parameters.description: The target position at which to copy the slide. Copy to the end by default.

optional_parameters.description: Name of the document to copy a slide from.

api_list.name: PostCopyMasterSlideFromSourcePresentation

required_parameters.name: cloneFrom
required_parameters.description: Name of the document to clone masterSlide from.

optional_parameters.name: applyToAll
optional_parameters.description: True to apply cloned master slide to every existing slide.

optional_parameters.name: cloneFromStorage
optional_parameters.description: Storage of the document to clone masterSlide from.

api_list.name: PostAlignShapes

required_parameters.name: alignmentType
required_parameters.description: Alignment type that will be applied to the shapes.

optional_parameters.name: alignToSlide
optional_parameters.description: If true, shapes will be aligned relative to the slide edges.

optional_parameters.name: position
optional_parameters.description: Position of the new paragraph in the list. Default is at the end of the list.

optional_parameters.description: Storage folder containing custom fonts to be used with the document.
